description:
cmd/go: fix 'go help <command>'

It depended on the old behavior of functions in structs.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d585d21aeba5 ***

cmd/go: fix 'go help <command>'

It depended on the old behavior of functions in structs.

CC=golang-dev, r
